content:
I know its true purpose now!
When I feel idle and don't know what to do,
I just open it and take a peek!

...Hm? Which one?
The Loomi on my phone~
The world's ten great mysteries include the hexagonal pyramid, the endless purple abyss, the hidden Butterfly Ear tribe... and somehow getting more Loomi points without doing anything.

So, besides the rent,
I'll need to work hard to gather more...
That's okay, new life always comes with new challenges.

If I had to calculate it myself,
I guess... my phone would crash by tomorrow.

The best thing about the Loomi software
is that it automatically calculates Loomi points!
You can't imagine how important this is to me...

Actually, during all that turbulence, 
I lost some of my research materials.
